::Cledar::

Cledar manages to keep his arm out of the way of the fire, his back
armor being charred. He spins around and fires a wave of plasma at
Sinnertwin, thought the plasma was weak due to his weapon not
completely cooling down yet.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., robertdahl <rdahl@t...> wrote:
> OOC: I agree.
> 
> BIC: 
> The vines encircled Sinnertwin, and started to tighten, but as soon
as
> they did, they began to split apart around his sharp jagged armour,
like
> a knife through spagetti, he didnt need to do anything, but turn
around,
> and the rest fell off, he then opened both mouths, and let loose two
> streams of flame at Cledar, as his back flame cannon turned and
fired at
> Cledar's arm again.
